system.description:
Bind a casting from any School of magic into an item that can be used repeatedly. Normally the casting could be used once a day (between sunrise and sunrise), although it is possible to change this. The Complexity of this spell must be at least twice the Complexity of the casting to be bound. Again, the caster should describe how the casting is to be activated.

If the caster wishes to allow the item to use the bound magic more often than once a day, then each additional use will increase the Complexity of this spell by the Complexity of the casting to be bound.

Preparing the item for the binding usually has a Cost equal to the Complexity of the Empower Item spell, and the caster must spend the Complexity in days in their laboratory preparing the item.
